comment.author: 79371310@N02
comment._content: This is the Valley of Kings in Egypt. I know this view, I was there. It is unbelievable hot there, because the river is so close. When it is summer and there is no wind the air is not breathable.

comment.author: 79371310@N02
comment._content: The Nil is in the dark band in the background and you have to climb a bit to go there.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 79371310@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives] I have to thank you, I appreciate this collection, the Double Decker's are looking great also the photos of the humans are very nice. Real "Indiana Jones" and "High Road to China".
